mapper.sql: company_cd, priority_order_cd, restrict_cd, category, pkg, capacity
mapper.insert:

company_cd,
priority_order_cd,
restrict_cd,
category,
pkg,
capacity,

mapper.update:
update priority_order_restrict_result
restrict_cd = #{restrictCd,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category = #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pkg = #{pkg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
capacity = #{capacity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into planocycle.priority_order_restrict_result(priority_order_cd,company_cd,restrict_cd,zokusei1,zokusei2,zokusei3,zokusei4,zokusei5,zokusei6, zokusei7,zokusei8,zokusei9,zokusei10,tana_cnt,sku_cnt,author_cd,editer_cd,edit_time,create_time) select priority_order_cd,company_cd,restrict_cd,zokusei1,zokusei2,zokusei3,zokusei4,zokusei5,zokusei6, zokusei7,zokusei8,zokusei9,zokusei10,tana_cnt,sku_cnt,author_cd,author_cd,now(),now() from planocycle.work_priority_order_restrict_result where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd=#{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update planocycle.priority_order_restrict_result set deleteflg=1 , editer_cd= #{authorCd} , edit_time=now() where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
